website_summaries.verdict: This is a straightforward Galaxy S8 case that's affordable, attractive, and rugged enough to protect your phone without breaking your budget.
pros: Clear, impact-resistant TPU material showcases the phone's aesthetics while protecting against most drops and impacts
Raised corners  keep the screen from rubbing against surfaces
cons: May not hold up against major rough treatment
No fancy features, but for the price, you may not mind

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Received my cover yesterday. Fits tightly, is simple, not clumsy and best of all holds the phone comfortably. The phone is so slippery. Now I feel secure handling it. And it hasn't lost its slim profile. Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CEL

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect protection for my S8. This product fits perfectly and the access to each action button performs well
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Sarasota

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's a rubber phone case, and it does all the things one might ask of a rubber phone case, with aplomb. Wish it had a bit more of a lip along the sides of the screen, rather than just the corners, but it's not an otterbox. I'll update if/when it yellows.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and one other case to try before even getting my new phone. I received them both the same day and instantly knew one of them was wrong. After receiving the screen protector, I knew this one was the wrong size, and even though it's listed for the Galaxy S8, it's obviously for the S8+. I'm not asking for a refund and I'll probably just put it away somewhere because it's super cheap, but keep in mind they might send the wrong size and need to pay better attention to what they're packing and shipping out compared to what they're advertising. But it seems like a good, stable, protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cockshutt

customer_reviews.title: Case junkie here. Best s8 cover!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 different covers for my fragile s8. Some are prettier, but this is the best. It's the only one with 4 bigger lips on the corners. They are significantly bigger than the others. I like gel skin cases for the newer phones because they're thin. This is heavy rubber, very protective, but still sleek overall. I just wish it came in colors. I had one of these in red on my old s6, it also came in blue. I also use a tempered glass screen protector. No interference.
customer_reviews.author: E. Donald

customer_reviews.title: Cover does its job great and it is very clear
customer_reviews.text: Had this cover for about a month now. I have accidently dropped phone hard various times and nothing happened to phone. Cover does its job great and it is very clear, nice and easy to put on and off. Its well worth the price. Would recommend this cover. Edit:Over time it turned a slight yellowish....but any brand or style made of plastic material will yellow over time no matter what....
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This case fits well on my Samsung S8. I was concerned about button area on both sides because a few previous reviewers mentioned that button area is off. However, mine is perfect. Maybe there are some defects out there. I see some bubbles between the phone and the case. It is not something to worry about. Bubbles should be gone with alcohol wipes. It has a great value for the price. Well made. I love the look of my phone in it.
customer_reviews.author: Coco Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My case it very loose on my phone and it also interferes with my fingerprint scanner. UPDATE: The company contacted me and sent me a replacement case. I love it. Fits great. Fingerprint scanner works fine. This is a great company that stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased expensive cases for my phone in the past but ended up removing them due to being bulky or difficulty using the phone with it on. This is a flexible cover that fits nicely over the back of my phone. I will need to purchase a separate screen saver. It doesn't add bulkiness to the phone and the control buttons are easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pam0955

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love the extra padding on the corners. Still thin enough to be unobtrusive and easy enough to take the cover off to use in a VR headshet, etc.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: I really don't like this wet looking contact on the back.
customer_reviews.text: I would love this case if it weren't for this one problem. I have tried cleaning the phone and the case to no avail. The material is kinda sticky but will not make uniform contact so it always looks poorly installed and dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: The case fits well and looks nice. It does not add significantly to the size ...
customer_reviews.text: The case fits well and looks nice. It does not add significantly to the size of the phone. I haven't dropped the phone yet, so I can't speak to screen protection (yet). Also, the case arrived in <48 hours from the time of placing the order.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Great Case if you like to actually see the phone you bought
customer_reviews.text: It seems when you buy a phone you don't need to worry about color or reall the back of it as you are going to throw a cover on it. Well with the this clear case that is not the "case" (wink). It does well on drops and is very slim, even with the bumpers on the sides, it feels smaller than my previous case. It does show finger prints but it easily wipes off and i have no issues with the fit on my S8.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: and the phone was completely fine. It hit its corner first then landed face ...
customer_reviews.text: This case saves my S8! I once dropped my phone from the height of waist to a concrete ground, and the phone was completely fine. It hit its corner first then landed face down, but still not a single scratch on the screen. The ground is very flat, though. I think the screen might still touch the ground if the ground is uneven. Anyway, the case still offers quite a good protection due to my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive phone case.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get a phone case that had extra protection around the corners. I looked at cases for probably 3 hours before I found this one. The extra protrusion of the corners providing protection against corner drops, but also providing a lift for the screen to avoid resting directly on any surface I place the phone on is a nice bit of insurance for the expensive phone investment. I do worry that the case may be slightly too stiff to prevent a screen from shattering, but hopefully I never find out.
customer_reviews.author: Turner.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This case has protected my phone very well. The corners are well protected for corner drops and the glass is well protected as long as it drops on a fairly flat surface. It doesn't bulk up the phone much. Cons: It has started to yellow after a year. You can't tell too much yet with the case on though. Also there's a kind of "bubble" on the back side under the case as if you put Scotch tape on a surface and needed to press it down harder. I can't seem to get that out. Overall I'm happy with it for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Basic but we'll done.. the corners are raised so that the screen isn't on whatever surface you have it on if you lay your phone face down. The edges don't interfere with a screen protector. All the buttons work well with a nice tactile feel.. all the cut outs are well placed and well done. It isn't super grippy, more of a smooth slick surface especially if your hands are sweaty.. but still much better than without a case.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple clear case. It's a fingerprint magnet and creates that 'watery effect on the back as it sticks to parts of your phone. However, I will say the seller provides a great customer service experience! So you won't be down on your luck if you do have issues with the product. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione Mars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: does not cover side of screen that well. Mine broke. UPDATE: They refunded my money, and the more I hear the S8 is a crap phone that breaks easily. 0 starts for Samsung, and 5 stars for a company that stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: David Ordiway

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this case. Provides protection and is not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: j. smith

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case when I bought my new GS8. I didn't want to hide the device I paid so much for, so I decided on a clear case. I've had it several months now without issue. It makes my phone easier to hold and grip, the S8 is a little narrow for my hands otherwise. It is holding up fine, has no yellowing so far which is common in these clear cases and fits great. I gave it 4 stars because while it does it's basic job, it is not going to protect your phone like an Otter or similar style case. This is inexpensive, provides protection from minor falls and dings, and shows off your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Really love this case looks gorgeous on my phone n just dropped my phone today waist height n phone was fine without a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Dynamically Clear phone case!
customer_reviews.text: The phone case is exactly what was described! I twisted it; folded end-to-end; folded the sides together & it returned to it's original shape! Very child safe! The case is so clear: it's like looking through a water bottle filled w/water! The case: it feels like the case is made of a semi-hard rubber material. The case is lite-weight (almost like a coke bottle lid)! It's so..... very comfortable in my hand. :)
customer_reviews.author: Titus73

customer_reviews.title: I love the low profile
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one of these a couple of year ago when I first bought my S8 phone, and it wore out. The plastic cracked at the edge which is why I only rated it 3 stars on durability. However, for the price, it's not a big deal to replace it. I love that it's profile is so low that my edge features work perfectly, and I can still slide it into my back pocket when the case is on it. Plus the clear plastic shows the original color of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella R Roach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lightweight case for the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. It's relatively lightweight, unobtrusive and the buttons still work well. Because it is clear, it does show fingerprints and you can see some light dust that accumulates between it and the phone - which doesn't bother me (I like seeing the natural color of the phone), but maybe opt for a solid color to avoid that if desired. I wouldn't recommend for harsh environments as the screen and camera lens are not covered. However I have clumsily dropped the phone a few times with no damage resulting from it. So it does work and it isn't in a suitcase sized case to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek N. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Splendid Case...But Not Scratch Resistant...
customer_reviews.text: Just Received This Case In The Mail This Morning~And I Must Say~Splendid Case Indeed~Im Quite Pleased With It...But As An Observation Moreso~Not A Complaint~That False Advertising Is NOT The Way To Sell Products...The Case Is NOT Scratch Resistant As Stated...It Had A Scratch Or 2 Upon It...And I Gently Wiped It~And Hairline Scratches Occurred...Apart From That~Its A Splendid Case~And I'm Quite Happy With My Purchase...Nice Packaging...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good case w beveled  edges but could be thicker
customer_reviews.text: Good case!! Beveled edges are a life saver. The case could be a little thicker for more durability. But they may have made it thinner for those people who like to put phones in their pockets. But a little more thickness would add a little additional protection. Main downfall is the clear case eventually takes on the color of the items it's been next to. But this is typical of clear cases but was hoping to find one made of different material that was more resistant to this effect.
customer_reviews.author: AN

customer_reviews.title: I love it, myself!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I do not have to hide my orchid grey color. As well as the extra protection on the corners. That's where I feel like it needs the most protection. However, I do not like the slight air bubble look on the back. Mine is very minimal compared to some of the other reviews so I will still give a 5 star. But I could understand why it would bother some.
customer_reviews.author: Lucero Magdaleno

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This case is the best for the price. It fit my S8 perfectly. Provides enough protection from inadvertant drops. No screen protection per se, but raised corners prevent screen impact if dropped on flat surface. I'm an office worker so works fine for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Otting

customer_reviews.title: Really hard to push the buttons
customer_reviews.text: i dont know whether i like this case or not. got it for my mom. looks great, feels great! prob is it is really hard to push the buttons on the side. it's hard for ME to push, much less my mom!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Not good fit for Samsung S8
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this case for the Samsung S8. The case is loose and does not come up enough on the sides to protect the phone edges from contact if dropped.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great case and great feel
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a fold over case , this is so much lighter and better. I dropped the phone on some tile by mistake and there was absolutely no damage. I really recommend this
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like the odd texture showing up on the back
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the way it looks on the phone. It leaves this weird wet look on the inside - I was expecting it to be clear and smooth. If it didn’t have that problem I would keep it. It’s a good weight rubber and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan

customer_reviews.title: I just love this cover
customer_reviews.text: I just love this cover. It is so light and make the phone so comfortabke to hold, as if there is nothing on the phone. The side bumpers feel great however not planning to test :)
customer_reviews.author: Ankul Maheshwari

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: Good Case. Feels sturdy and comfortable. I have drop my phone a few times and my phone Is still fine.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Cedeno

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Total trash. No protection at all. Had to get another phone because of cracked screen. Threw it in the trash after 2nd crack in screen.
customer_reviews.author: moto74eldo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought it was going to fit perfectly and look smooth on the back. I was wrong. It's a decent case but it looks like the back of my phone is wet and dirty. Definitely not what I was expecting. Update: I was contacted by seller and was offered a refund since my case made my phone look wet.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia

customer_reviews.title: Make it versatile with your photos
customer_reviews.text: Love having a clear case. I cut and place a photo inside the case and change it out when ever I want.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Zboralski

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate description for product
customer_reviews.text: In the description is false in claiming it is scratch resistant and finger print proof. I barely did a test with my nail and the scratch stayed and my finger prints are all over my phone. They are all very visible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case too tight at the phone charging port
customer_reviews.text: The case partly blocks the charging port and the charging cable frequently falls out
customer_reviews.author: Dick_bangkok

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good case. Already dropped my phone on concrete a few times & not a scratch!
customer_reviews.author: Lesly

customer_reviews.title: Simple but works
customer_reviews.text: It works as described, nothing fancy about it. It's just how it's pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Unsightly spots
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to function in the manner that it was advertised. What I don't like about it is the way the clear case looks against the dark colored phone in the back. There are several wet looking spots that just will not dissipate. It is not a good look. I remove the case and cleaned the protector as well as the phone and the wet looking spots still remain upon application.
customer_reviews.author: Bluman

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The case fit my S8 perfectly, with no problems. It appears to be very sturdy, but don't know about durability since I just got it; so can only give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with curved screen protector
customer_reviews.text: This prpduct fit the phone good. It is a flimsy rubber. But will protect outside of phone. It will not protect if you drop your phone flat face down on a rock. This case does not work with curved screen protectors. They don't fit well together.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Just received my case and I didnt realize it was flexible which I like. The case makes my phone feel slim as if it wasn't in a case which is very different than the case I currently had on it. Hoping I have no problems with discolration. I'm not willing to take the "drop and see" test to see if it's durable but so far so good. Loving it!
customer_reviews.author: msbree

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Galaxy 8 phone case
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, doesn't interact with protective scratch guard, & almost invisible. Stops my phone from sliding out of my shirt pocket. I like this case a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Worley

customer_reviews.title: Uneven contact looks splotchy
customer_reviews.text: I normally like clear cases a lot but the one I received clings to one spot on the back of the phone in a weird way and it looks like a big splotch, not nice and clean. Otherwise it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Portland Pedaler

customer_reviews.title: Fits my device perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Just got this item this week. Cannot comment on durability, but fits and looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Shahnaz Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Yellow
customer_reviews.text: I like the clear look of cases but I hate that its yellowed over time. Overall I like the case and the yellow doesnt show much on my darker colored phone. It works with my magnetic phone holder too.
customer_reviews.author: Lasting Peony

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to use until i got an otterbox but i would use this as a main case as well. The quality is surprisingly really good and seems very durable. It's also great if you wanna show off your phone as well
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Comsoon S8 case.
customer_reviews.text: Very good, corner reinforced, economical case. I feel one improvement could be easily made. The sides could have a somewhat rougher texture that would allow a better, more sure grip of the device. I'm satisfied and may enhance the grip texture myself.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Klimek

customer_reviews.title: Case is great except...
customer_reviews.text: I can't get the case on my phone without it looking as if it has wet Mark's on it which it doesn't. Other than that I love it. Does anyone have any suggestions for me?
customer_reviews.author: marti

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for in a case
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the positive reviews that convinced me to purchase this affordable case for my s8. It fits beautifully, looks awesome in person and does not have the issue of "water/trapped air look" on the back as some other clear cases. I wanted a very thin case and this is exactly what i needed. Go for it, its 10 bucks! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beantown

customer_reviews.title: I love it !!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to put on , light . Makes it easier to when using a clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Everything you wanted
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly and without a lot of hassle. Protects the phone on all sides. Very affordable and very protected.
customer_reviews.author: Ranged Healer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection. Great value. Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case. Not bulky. Good protection and you can see your sleek phone inside.
customer_reviews.author: szh

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly but has 2 extra small holes on the side that don't line up with anything on the S8. It is a little bulky with the corner bumpers but that's to be expected if you want better corner protection. I might try the case without the extra corner pads next time.
customer_reviews.author: Oli L

customer_reviews.title: A 'CLEAR' choice...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's new Galaxy s8. I knew no matter what color I bought, it wouldn't be the RIGHT color. So, I chose the CLEAR case...! She loves it and I'm relieved to know, her phone is protected.
customer_reviews.author: Neil from N.H.

customer_reviews.title: durable and will protect your phone
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally dropped my phone twice. Luckily, both times I had this case and it protected my phone from any damage. If you're looking for a reliable case that will protect your S8 from drops, this one will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: David Cheung

customer_reviews.title: It has a pink tint to it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's because it's from a warehouse deal, but my case has a pinkish hue to it. The case fits well and I like the extra corner protection and the slightly raised lip so it won't scratch the screen face down.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: That's annoying and I wish I hadn't thrown away the box
customer_reviews.text: It keeps adding some kind of dust to my phone when it rubs against the edges. That's annoying and I wish I hadn't thrown away the box. Otherwise it fits the product pretty well so I can't complain about everything. Edit: Well, the seller offered a partial refund and to have their engineer review the design. For that I'll add another star for the price and immediate seller response.
customer_reviews.author: Vende

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love the extra corner protection, especially being on a Galaxy s8 which have the curved screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She is delighted with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife. She is delighted with it. This case fits wonderfully in the phone and the bumpers on the corners seem to be very protective. Its clear crystal condition allows her to appreciate the beauty of the phone. We are waiting for the delivery of the free cases offered by T-Mobile, however I suspect my wife will keep this case since she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable. It already slides off and the back of the phone broke when it fell even with this case on.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect. It's actually soft plastic so it won't break ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. It's actually soft plastic so it won't break and is totally see through. Perfect. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tahitibuzz

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like that the case is clear being that I've always have had a black case. Also makes the whole case glow when you get messages.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: iphone 11 Case review
customer_reviews.text: This case was for my work phone and I did not want to spend a lot on it. I got this case in and I have been very pleased. It keeps the look of the phone and I have not had any yellowing on the case. It has dropped a couple times and no issues with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Anneler

customer_reviews.title: just as described, good quality, easy install, good value.
customer_reviews.text: fits my s8 perfectly, protects the sides and back well. corners are lifted for extra drop protection
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii T

customer_reviews.title: Great product and low price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good! It's affordable and does a great job protecting your phone, especially with the nice little bumpers around the edges. It nicely protects the edges of the Galaxy s8. I have ordered two of these for my phone and my mom's and we are both pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Frost

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but dropped it once and my screen cracked.. Don't waste your Money!! Buy one that is durable..
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great protector and thin.
customer_reviews.text: fits great and it feels like it'll protect against minor drops. Great price for something so thin.
customer_reviews.author: bryan24kaos

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely indispensible!
customer_reviews.text: Great case, the padding on the corners, is the key, I think. I have dropped the phone and it never has a mark on it!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl roether

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The case was just what I wanted, Nice and clear, fit perfectly without a lot of bulk or added weight and a good price. The delivery was quick and I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great protection!
customer_reviews.text: It isn't flashy but does a great job at protecting the phone.
customer_reviews.author: PJC

customer_reviews.title: Great look great design
customer_reviews.text: The case looks just like the picture. It was exactly what I wanted to protect my phone from short drops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I dont like about it is the marks on the back from ...
customer_reviews.text: Well it fits, I dont know about protection of the case yet because I just received it yesterday. Decent feel to it. Only thing I dont like about it is the marks on the back from the case sticking to the back of the phone, makes it look like theres liquid in between but there isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great transaction.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly described, delivered on time and priced perfectly. What more could one ask? Great transaction.
customer_reviews.author: David Robertson

customer_reviews.title: It allows the "look" of the phone to show through ...
customer_reviews.text: It allows the "look" of the phone to show through while giving it the protection it needs. Fits well and not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this case! It's so lightweight & unobtrusive that you hardly know it's attached to your phone, which still looks beautiful through the clear protector. And I'm picky. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. But it's new
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. But it's new. If it lasts I'm a happy camper. Seems to offer good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Looks great perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The edges stick out past the curved screen of the S8 very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Engle

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Weight Protector
customer_reviews.text: Very nice with great fit! Works perfectly when I want my phone to fit in a smaller purse but still want protection!
customer_reviews.author: R. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect. Great bumper cushion guard on the corners!!! Not slippery to hold. I have a pop socket but use it occasionally
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B.

customer_reviews.title: good product for the
customer_reviews.text: It protects my phone really well. I have dropped my galaxy s8 more times than I can count and the bumpers really saved it from harm! product yellows over time but what can you expect from a clear case? good product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Ruby M.

customer_reviews.title: good enough, 3 stars because
customer_reviews.text: good enough, 3 stars because: it's a little sticky in the beginning, I don't know what's made out of this product.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I have dropped my phone several times and this case kept it protected.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Nothing not to like about it. Will buy another one. Great product for price - it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W

customer_reviews.title: I love mine. Only downfall is that it shows fingerprints
customer_reviews.text: I love mine. Only downfall is that it shows fingerprints. I plan on custom bringing mine.
customer_reviews.author: Lmhall

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I had this same case for over a year previously and had to replace it but only because it had gotten really dirty at work. It fits like a glove and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Realy protects the phone and it not so bulky
customer_reviews.author: javo

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Case; flexible, cushioned corners, fits well & fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Judd R. Zillioux

customer_reviews.title: Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product but came late and the first one was the wrong order.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Daigle

customer_reviews.title: It would be good to know it will save my phone, if fell down
customer_reviews.text: Its a low profile case. That assures easy handling and more room in your pocket
customer_reviews.author: Naftali Haskell

customer_reviews.title: Protects my phone as promised and fits tight but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Protects my phone as promised and fits tight but it bubbles no matter how much I try to get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Cristal Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy-duty
customer_reviews.text: So this case overall is decent. But it is definitely not heavy-duty. Sure, it will save your phone from a few scratches, but if you drop it wrong there is a high possibility that your phone will crack like mine did. My phone is still functional, but it is a bummer that the back of my phone is now cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Nice protection
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit. Nice protection as it extends over the screen so you won't have to worry about dropping the phone face down.
customer_reviews.author: clare

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple clear case that protects well. No problems with it at all
customer_reviews.author: grammabear

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Just received case but a first sight looks good. The edges are nice, thick and raised. Hopefully enough for an accidental fall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and good quality. It covers front screen on top and bottom and corners are wider for falls. Curved sides menus are easy accesible even with the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Figueroa

product_meta.title: Galaxy S8 Case, Comsoon [Drop Cushion] [Crystal Clear] Soft PC TPU Bumper Slim Protective Case Cover with Raised Bezels for Samsung Galaxy S8 2017
feature_bullets: Slim & Ultra Clear: Clear TPU case is made of highest quality anti-yellowing materials, thin and light-weight, offers maximum protection and extra durability from scratches and hits around your Galaxy S8 Phone.

Endless DIY Possibility: Transparent protection case body keeps your phone in the original color and nature beauty; Also provides you with customize possibility for the clear back according to your special personality.

All Around Safety: Raised edges around camera and front display screen lips lift the phone off the ground surface when drop down to ensure Phone safety; Extra bumper protection at four corners for drop cushion.

Full Access: Perfect match and easy access to all buttons and ports through advanced engineering technology; Unique Matte Process on button covers for tactile response and at both edges for firm grip.
Comsoon Galaxy S8 Phone Case, Compatible with Samsung S8 only(2017)
